name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented Senior Webflow Engineer with 8 years of experience in high-performance web development, specializing in **Webflow**, responsive design, SEO, and detailed analytics. Proficient in creating seamless site integrations, animations, and microinteractions, ensuring optimal user experience with a keen understanding of modern design principles using **Figma**. Additionally, I have foundational knowledge in the integration of frameworks such as **Svelte** and am skilled in remote collaboration. 
My robust background in full-stack development encompasses modern technologies like **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms with a strong focus on microservices architecture and CI/CD automation while maintaining compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. My experience also extends to cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS**, alongside the development of machine learning pipelines and implementation of MLOps workflows using **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
